text: Asɨzir me maketɨn amadiba, ia dar amɨ. Egh navir averiamɨn nɨghnɨzir avɨribar amu, tintinimɨn azangsɨghan markɨ suam, a dera o a ikufi. Puvatɨ.10:25 Dughiar mabar me asɨziba marvir guabar ofa gamua, egha gɨn da isa ghua maketɨn da amadi. Ezɨ Pol kamaghɨn mɨgei, Kraisɨn adarazi maketɨn ivezir asɨzibagh nɨghnɨgh osɨman markɨ, egh suam, me dar amegh, paza damigham. Puvatɨ. Me dar amam.
